newsitem.title: UK: Williams gains on disposal news.
newsitem.headline: Williams gains on disposal news.

text.p: Shares in international manufacturing group Williams Holdings Plc gained 6-1/2p to 346 by 0938 GMT on Wednesday following news of its disposal of 15 UK-orientated businesses for 360 million stg.
Analysts said they had been looking for such a move, which involves the sale of businesses outside the group's three main divisions and a net cash inflow of 303 million stg.
"It reduces net debt down to zero, allowing them to pursue acquisitions in the core areas of fire protection, security and home improvement," said Andrew Crispin of Societe Generale.
"It's a buy from these levels," he said, adding a trading update from the company confirmed the expected trends.
Volume in Williams shares was some 1.1 million shares.
